item.description:
This was one of our popular events in 2009- yesterday we decided to post it again for this year.

What do you do on Superbowl Sunday if you're not a sports fan? I believe in the Boston area, you may be subject to a fine
Well what would you think of meeting up at 2pm at Solea's Restaurant and Tapas Bar and having tapas and sangria? Afterwards, we simply walk over to the Embassy and catch the 5pm showing of Avatar, Serious Man, Dear John, or From Paris with Love, We'll keep an eye on new releases and show times as we get closer. What a wonderful way to spend this Superbowl Sunday!!

UPDATE:We'll meet at 2pm, enjoy drinks, tapas and head over to the Embassy Theatre:
Movie Selection and Times:
Dear John 4p
Precious 4:10p
Invictus 3:30p
The Young Victoria 3:40
Avatar 4:20
Superbowl Alternative - Tapas and aâ€¦
We're at 23 confirmed attendees, we will close this meetup at 25

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Superbowl Alternative - Tapas and a Movie - 2010
